react_01_react_content_management_system.name: React Content Management System
react_01_react_content_management_system.description: Build content management system using React
react_01_react_content_management_system.prompt:
Create a content management system with:
- Article creation and editing
- Media library management
- User roles and permissions
- Content scheduling
- SEO optimization tools
- Analytics integration
- Multi-language support
- Template system
- Comment moderation
- Mobile-responsive admin

Requirements:
- Rich text editor
- File upload system
- User authentication
- Content workflow
- SEO features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

react_02_react_event_management_platform.name: React Event Management Platform
react_02_react_event_management_platform.description: Build event management platform using React
react_02_react_event_management_platform.prompt:
Create an event management platform with:
- Event creation and scheduling
- Ticketing system
- Attendee registration
- Calendar integration
- Venue management
- Speaker profiles
- Sponsor management
- Live streaming
- Mobile app
- Payment processing

Requirements:
- Calendar integration
- Payment processing
- Real-time updates
- Mobile optimization
- Social features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

react_03_react_customer_support_portal.name: React Customer Support Portal
react_03_react_customer_support_portal.description: Build customer support portal using React
react_03_react_customer_support_portal.prompt:
Create a customer support portal with:
- Ticket submission system
- Knowledge base
- Live chat support
- FAQ management
- User account management
- Support analytics
- Email notifications
- File attachments
- Multi-language support
- Mobile optimization

Requirements:
- Real-time chat
- Ticket management
- Knowledge base
- User authentication
- Mobile design
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

- Multi-warehouse support
- Purchase order management
- Mobile scanning
- Real-time updates

- Reporting tools
